brief.content-text:
The animation depicts the process of a host joining a dynamic V LAN.

A new host connects to the LAN. It sends out a packet that says, "00:07:B3:11:12:13 is requesting membership in a V LAN." The packet reaches the V LAN management server which says, "00:07:B3:11:12:13 is in my database. Assign that port to V LAN 18."

The packet is returned to the switch port that the requesting host is connected to. The switch says, "I am assigning this port to V LAN 18."
